refnamediv.refpurpose: Reports the usage of cpu either total or per core.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Reports the usage of cpu either total or per core to monitor how close to max-out the processing is.
Please note that this opcode is currently only supported on GNU/Linux and MacOS.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: ifreq is the time in seconds that the meter is refreshed. If this is too low then mainly figures of zero or one hundred occur. A value of 0.1 seems acceptable.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: cpumeter reads the total idle time in the last ifreq seconds and reports it as a percentage usage. If more than just ktot results are requested these report the same value for individual cores.
